place_description: Non-profit restaurant serving breakfasts, sandwiches & salads amid warehouse-style decor.

reviews_data.review_text:
They have business have turkey sausage THAT GOOD!!! I would happily order from here every day of the week if my wallet could afford it, haha

Update: I CANT FORGET ABOUT THE POTATOES! Crispy and delicious.
Drinks are excellent
Wonderful cafe, all the staff members were incredibly friends and helpful. Food was great but what makes it so amazing is that this restaurant helps an amazing cause because Community Matters!!!!
Unbelievably great food and a kind courteous staff. Love this place.
This place has a tasty food, excellent service and amazing space. I ate the chicken salad and was delicious . Come and try, you want to come back
Good food, good coffees. Just wish they were open on weekends.
The aroma of coffee made me want some when I came in. We were warmly greeted and shown to an open table. The service and food were both great. We will have to return. Picture of my Johnny Cake dish.
Food was good. Six of us had 5 different menu items. Flapjacks and egg plates. French toast was not my fav but one kid liked it.
The food was delicious, and the service was outstanding! Cherished the air. Clean - modern - current stylistic layout and I love a big motivator for it!

I recently had the most incredible birthday breakfast at this amazing spot! From the moment I walked in, the staff were welcoming. Their warm and friendly service truly set the tone for a memorable morning.

The food at this place is absolutely delicious. I ordered a coffee and their Rye sandwich, and it exceeded all expectations. The flavors were perfectly balanced, and the presentation was top-notch. Each bite was a delightful.

What made my birthday breakfast even more special was when the staff surprised me with a birthday cookie! It was such a thoughtful gesture that made me feel extra loved and appreciated. The cookie itself was scrumptious, with a soft center and just the right amount of sweetness.

The ambiance of this breakfast spot is cozy and inviting. It's the kind of place where you can relax, enjoy your meal, and soak in the positive energy. The decor is charming, and the atmosphere is buzzing with positivity.

I can't praise the staff enough for their exceptional service. They were attentive, friendly, and went above and beyond to make my birthday breakfast unforgettable. Their genuine care and attention to detail truly made me feel special. A special shout-out to Adriana!

I highly recommend this breakfast spot to anyone looking for a memorable dining experience. Whether it's a special occasion or just a regular morning, you'll be treated to amazing food, outstanding service, and a warm, welcoming atmosphere. I can't wait to go back and create more wonderful memories!

Thank you to the staff for making my birthday morning so incredibly special. You guys rock!
Lovely first time experience!! Plan to return
Excellent food however you need to make a reservation if you intend to eat there. They have a place to mingle and drink coffee and beverages. Nice atmosphere.

This is an experience of relaxation, with coffee and food.  I felt like I could sit and enjoy comfortable conversion all morning long.
As a plus, their coffee and pancakes make a wonderful addition to the experience!

Looking for a great coffee shop that's more than just a place to grab a latte? Look no further than this hidden gem in town! Not only does it serve incredible drinks and tasty food, but it also provides an opportunity for folks to get their life back on track and learn work skills.

The Honey bee latte is a must-try, but the real magic is in the community. By supporting this coffee shop, you're helping to restore hope and give people a chance to be a part of life once again. Plus, with an event space that can comfortably fit up to thirty people, it's a great spot for meetings or seminars.

William, the manager, is incredibly knowledgeable and helpful when it comes to managing the event space. So, whether you're looking for a spot to catch up with friends or host a professional gathering, this coffee shop has got you covered. Come for the coffee, stay for the community and see how hope is being restored here!
This place is so wonderful and is such a great cause that I can't put words together to properly review. Just go!
As an african american I was told there was no seating in the restaurant. My caucasian friend who had no reservation walked in and was seated immediately in the restaurant. This was humiliating.

Great idea for a restaurant that should be fully supported by the community, with decent food and nice atmosphere, but with slow service during busy lunch times (that can be excused as most of the staff are from the rescue mission). I had the New Orleans chicken sandwich with a side of home fries. The sandwich was huge, but was not sauced as expected, since the order was mixed up and they had put the sauce on the side. The staff is being trained so we know going in that service may be slow. Other orders like the French toast were delicious. I will be back to support this restaurant with their hopeful message.
Everyone was extremely pleasant and the food and service was great, I had the Cajun skillet, which I recommend, even the toast was delicious
Absolute must visit. This place is very upbeat and a great spot for young professionals to unwind and network.
Awesome breakfast! The place is a little loud when it gets busy and service a little slow but we were in no rush and really enjoyed eating here.

They're doing great work here. The food is wonderful and the drinks are very large mugs of good coffee. We've attended here several times for work outing lunches, and are 100% behind the mission. Thank y'all for the work you do!
Great food, service and cause. Try the breakfast sandwich, grits and ginger tea!

The French toast was very appetizing. As for the service, I was not satisfied. We booked a private party and they barley checked on us and the food took forever to come out. One of the servers was passive aggressive when asked to bring an item with the reply of "I only have 2 hands".
Great service , short but very good menu. Well executed food.

We honestly had no idea what this establishment was until partway through our meal, and even without knowing that we still would have left a rave. We are not from the Charlotte area, so we randomly found a highly rated restaurant to bring our family of four, and were impressed from the start. The place looks very stylish from the outdoor patio and upon entering, it just got prettier as we enjoyed the Christmas decor in the lounge area where we spent a few minutes during our short wait for a table. The staff were sweet with our two young kids, and sat us promptly in the posh yet warm dining area. Several TVs were hung high and each had a different classic Christmas movie on. The menu looked impressive and we were excited to order from not only the unique dishes but also the variety of sides and small plates. Our server was SO friendly and, as former servers ourselves, my husband and I could tell this guy was experienced and competent. He accommodated our split-tab for work travel, he offered to split a hot cocoa for our little ones and even made sure it wasn't too hot for them. At this point we still had no idea about any mission behind this restaurant, and once the food came it was all DELICIOUS so we were already starting to understand the many perfect reviews on google. The pulled pork Johnny cake had SO much flavor and just the right amount of ginger and spice. The New Orleans chicken sandwich was everything you'd want it to be and quite large. We also had the black garlic and Parmesan Brussels sprouts and, possibly my favorite, the honey hot sweet potatoes. Everything was notably tasty! Also, when our youngest spilled his hot cocoa another staff member took care of that mess and replacing it for us. She told us what the establishment was all about, and it was only then that we paid any attention to the name of the place I suppose having a 4 and 6 year old, at the end of a vacation, will do that to you Another lady also explained about the Christmas at the Cafe event, gave us vouchers for two free coffees/cocoas in the future, and she had made several stops at our table to play with the kids. It was a very supportive staff because we hadn't even noticed our server had taken a break until he came back until told us. He then explained much more about what they do for the community, and truly it's such a gift to meet people apart of an organization that provides such a valuable service to people in need. And more than that, the business is thoroughly impressive, they don't seem like a charity kitchen at all (which would be fine if they did)- the vibes were very up and up, very hip and on trend with flavors and atmosphere alike. Our experience would have been rave worthy even without their mission, but with that we felt especially compelled to follow through in writing that rave. But WHAT'S MORE... I left my car key in the restroom, and we drove back to the Raleigh area right away (using my husband's car key) I didn't realize until the next day, and they were ON IT, awaiting the call! The gentleman took down my mailing info right away and took care of the whole thing, mailing it to our home. We will DEFINITELY be coming back to Community Matters Cafe any time we are in the Charlotte area. Big thanks to these wonderful people and their mission.
Really good stop if you are in town. Very good portions and good food. A coffee shop area for relaxing.

The food and drinks were high quality, flavorful, and definitely made with love! Their menu changes so that it's always seasonal and fresh. Very affordable for such high-end dishes. Amazing environment, a great mission, and excellent service
A fantastic addition to the neighborhood. Great menu, excellent food, great service. My only complaint is that they close at 2 PM.
got a latte from here that was so bad it was undrinkable  so bitter that even the milk and sugar couldn't save it
We love this place! Great food and great mission!
I absolutely love this place. Many healthy options .NY dish is zucchini, quinoa, duck meet tip with duck egg ! Side with hot tea ... total of $25

Beautiful neighborhood cafe with a purpose. The employees are warm and the place is so welcoming...I love the decor....there are lots of tables and chairs to sit and work and plenty of parking spots. I have tried their chai lattes and their muffins and they are amazing and served warm in the mornings. It is a very popular spot and it's nice to see it busy even at 7:30am. Definitely try it out.
Food and coffee are great, so are the people! Highly recommend stopping here if in the Charlotte area on a weekday

Atmosphere is incredible. The place is kept clean and the coffee was good too. My only complaint is the staff were impolite. Had an awkward interaction with a man standing at the host stand when I came inside.  He didn't greet me when I came in or say anything to me at all so I simply said  "hi how are you" and he answered back kind of rudely "what"? It was weird. Also when I ordered my coffee I asked nicely if I could please have a mug instead of the plastic coffee cup and this girl grabbed it for me with an attitude

This place has great coffee honestly. You can find comparable quality meals at other similarly styled places for cheaper or same price but their coffee quality keeps me coming back to pay the extra dollar. Very friendly service also which goes a long way at a relaxing place like this.
I'd give 6 stars if I could! The service is SPECTACULAR! The food was yummy and not badly priced. I loved the ambiance of the entire atmosphere. I'll definitely be back soon!

Love this place! Went for the first time today and not only was the staff great but the food was delicious!! All of our meals were so good and the coffee was as well. Our waiters and the rest of the staff were so kind, one man even brought a bowl of blueberries for my 1 year old :). Can't wait to go back!
Loved the music and the mission of Community Matters. I needed a place to work for a few hours and the customer service was outstanding! What a blessing!!
Firstly, I love what this place does for the community.  Secondly, the food, the service, and the atmosphere are all perfect.  I highly recommend coming here if you're in the area.

This place is amazing in so many ways! The breakfast was great and super delicious in a very nice and inviting atmosphere. But what tops it all is the cause and mission of this place! Keep up the great work!!
This has always been one of my favorite places to get coffee in charlotte. Not only are they helping the community but they are incredibly friendly and have great coffee and food.
Amazing French toast
Had an amazing BLT. Service was good and great spot also to do some work during lunch. I try lots of BLT's in the area and this one really blew me away.
First time visiting and the food was amazing
One of my favorite spots in Charlotte! A must for coffee and breakfast/brunch.
Great food and customer service!

Great atmosphere, nice aesthetics and impressive mission statement with attentive service and tasty food. If you are looking for not just great food but a warm experience too then you must visit this place!
It is good - portions are substantial and well made. Service is very attentive.
The food, the staff, the coffee, the atmosphere... everything was amazing! So happy we found this gem.
Great service, delicious food, and clean space. I will be back.
Simple food, great atmosphere and an awesome mission. Would gladly come back! Overall a great experience, had the egg sandwich and it was tasty.

We had senico and he was absolutely incredible. He had patience for everyone including tables with lesser mannerisms. He was kind and made sure we were happy and satisfied and even cracked a few jokes with us here and there. Best service I have honestly ever received when being in charlotte!!!! Thank you senico!!!
Great dining experience and group meeting space!

Me and two of my friends decided to check out a new restaurant in Charlotte, NC. When we arrived at the restaurant we were greeted with a big smile and we loved the ambience of Community Matters Cafe. The menu was concise and simple with both Breakfast, Brunch, and Lunch options.

I ordered the hot Cinnamon Bun Mocha and it was delicious! The cream on top was so good and it felt like I was having a dessert beverage. For Lunch I ordered the New Orleans Fried Chicken Sandwich with cheddar grits. I loved the cheesy grits and it was yummy. The chicken sandwich wasn't too spicy and it was straight fire!

Overall, it was delicious and I totally recommend this restaurant if you are in the Uptown area of Charlotte, NC!

Was so excited to try this place afte le hearing great things. Service was not good at all. Waited 45 mins for our food. Server didn't come by during that time at all. When food came order was incorrect. Then I had to wait longer for it to be re done. I'm giving one star because the coffee was really good. But I likely will not return.
Very good food & coffee!
Always enjoy the Cafel they never disappoint!

Great food, amazing staff, large and comfortable space. I loved the prosperi-Tea . It's their take on a medicine ball but it's so much better. Great cafe to come and hang out or have a small meeting.
Large (free) parking lot.

Can't wait to come back when it's a little warmer and take advantage of the outdoor patio seating.
Amazing place!! Great food, great service and wonderful cause!! Family friendly and the patio is great for small pets!!

My friend and I dined at the Cafe today and our food and coffee was excellent.  The service was kind of absent, though.  We had not received our bill which is primarily the reason we were still at our table.  The FOH manager came to our table and said we needed to leave our table because of people having reservations.  We explained that we have not received our bill.  He said "no problem, I'll take care of you".  However, he never took care of us.  We were a little taken aback by the situation because he simply disappeared.  I went to the barista counter and explained the situation and she apologized profusely.  She was a wonderful person and even gave us a free coffee because we had explained we wanted to take a latte to go.  That was completely unexpected, but much appreciated after we felt like we were being kicked out.  I would have liked to speak to the FOH manager again, but he never did end up coming back to speak/assist us.
Over priced
The best chai latte I've ever had in my life and I've had alot! Also had the breakfast bowl substituted with turkey sausage and it was amazing. New favorite spot.
The atmosphere, food, coffee and perhaps most significantly their mission make this place my favorite in Charlotte.

Came here for a coffee meeting recently and was pleasantly surprised. The space is pretty big and it was bustling with people on a Wednesday morning having meetings or getting some work done. The energy was great!

I didn't eat breakfast but I enjoyed a really good gingerbread latte.

Located near uptown and lots of free parking in their parking lot.
Really great atmosphere, delicious drinks, and a wonderful purpose! We were visiting from out of town and wanted a good coffee shop to hang out at for a morning. I could have spent many hours here!
These guys are on point. Great location, they support a legit mission. Eating in or taking out the coffee and food is good. I recommend.
This is a great place all around. I would probably return to this spot if I ever came around here again!

First time visiting. Satisfied with the experience overall.  Didn't have time for dine-in. Ordered the Fall Maple Salad.  Enjoyed the flavors of everything together.  Was a little disappointed that the sweet potato chip in the description was not what was presented. I like the concept but not sure if I will be able to frequent due to limited vegan options.
Good food, friendly,  accommodating service.  Will definitely be  back!

Came here for brunch with our pup mid-week and it was such a win! They were very accommodating, sat us outside with the dog, service was friendly and fast, food and coffees were delicious. Don't know if they're planning to replicate the model in other cities, but we wish we had one in our home town! Thanks so much for such a treat of a place.
Our meal was amazing. The staff were friendly and helpful. Would recommend to anyone. The mission behind the establishment is incredible

The building is amazing, but the service was completely lost... After be seated we order our food and when we were still waiting for our food the server came with the bill and we said to him that we didn't get our food yet ... He came back few minutes late with a cold  food that we didn't ordered. Since we were waiting so long we decided to eat that food and never come back to this place again.

This scramble was delicious! I had it without the sausage it comes with and it was one of the tastiest dishes I've had. The freshly made bread and homemade peach preserves was the perfect accompaniment. I enjoy supporting this organization given their commitment to the community. It's a great place to do business meetings as well.

This is an incredible place! The atmosphere is clean, calm, and organized. All staff are helpful and pleasant. I also find it important to note that the staff were all hands in with helping each other because that helps to promote the pleasant atmosphere. I look forward to a return visit. Parking was also nice, which can also be a bonus when going anywhere in Charlotte. It felt amazing to be somewhere good and positive and contribute to something good.
The food is always soooo good! The staff is friendly and helpful. Just walking in the building makes me happy!
Food was very good and the people that work here are super friendly!! Sugared French toast is terrific as was the classic breakfast and caramel macchiato. The chalkboard in the ladies room is sweet.
Amazing coffee, amazing food, amazing service
Great cozy cafe. Good breakfast options! Great place to work.
Excellent breakfast and English breakfast tea. Friendly staff.
Food was excellent! Service was excellent!

I came here after hours on a Yelp elite event I was so thankful for the opportunity to be able to learn about this business and all the amazing things they are doing in the community and for everyone that are struggling with addiction. We spoke with one of the managers Paul to hear first hand how much good they are doing at this amazing cafe. We had a nice spread of food that included French toast, cookies, chicken sandwich, salad and ricotta toast. Out of all the food and drink options the chai tea latte was out of this World delicious and flavorful. The ricotta toast was creamy and with some tartness from the tomatoes. I will definitely return again not just because of how great the food and drinks are but because it is very rare you get to eat at a place that is doing so much good in the community.
Best breakfast I've had! Will was very helpful and explained the mission of the cafe

Great service, atmosphere, coffee, food, and for a great cause. I love the people here, the whole vibe of this place makes you feel at home. Plenty of seating indoors and oudoors. Highly recommend you come check it out.
Excellent atmosphere to get work done, have business meetings, and meet other people who are just as passionate for the work they are doing as you are!

Love this place. The atmosphere and set up are so nice and spacious, clean, inviting, and so much to admire from their merch to their coffee roasting set up & selection. Coffee was smooth and easy to drink
Service was attentive but not suffocating.
Food was fresh and tasty I tried their signature johnny cakes with pulled pork . I was apprehensive at 1st thinking it could be spicy but it wasn't it was so tasty and complex in flavors. My girl got the classic breakfast and was pleased.

The baked goods seemed a little underwhelming so we skipped that section

The mission statement for this cafe really warms your heart. We love food with a purpose and supporting local businesses that help the community like this one.

Check them out and be sure to go and support this amazing cause and get great eats in the process!
Breakfast was awesome & staff was great. What a great place indeed :)

This is the best place to get a chicken sandwich in the entire city. NO CAP. I work at the stadium and come here multiple times a week for lunch.  The staff are so friendly, food is AMAZING, and the purpose and reason behind it is also incredible! Eat here and help make a change in someones life!

Ps: the new orleans chicken sandwich will absolutely change your life as well. SO GOOD. (Get the side of black garlic mayo to add and ranch)

Incredible customer service.  I placed an order online and when I arrived I was told the system had an error.  Everyone was so apologetic.  I had 3 different people apologize for the inconvenience including the Manager/owner.  My food was made promptly and they gave me a complimentary pastry.  100% would come back.  Breakfast sandwich and home fries was great coffee was phenomenal 10/10
A Fantastic place for lunch!! The food is super fresh and good sized portions
Amazing Place!
Love this spot, good food & coffee! Whether you're,poking to get work done or just to eat, this is the spot.
Great spot. I had the classic breakfast with cheese grits and yogurt parfait. It was delicious and I would definitely come back.

iroironabatsukuguraundonoRen tachigaDong iteimasu. totemoYi Wei noaruHuo Dong niZan Tong surutoTong Shi niDong iteirusubetenoRen niHao Yi De dearitaitoSi imashita. 
Shi Jian gakakatsutariJian Wei igaarukamoshiremasenga, Si haQi ninarimasendeshita. sandoitsuchimoyo-gurutomoMei Wei shikatsutadesu.

The facility is amazing and is super clean ... the staff is very friendly and I was super impressed with our first breakfast here and hope to return...
Downtown views but off the main drag such as no traffic worries and plenty of parking...
Outdoor dining is spacious!
Choices are limited for breakfast but they cover all the necessary staples!
Every customer we observed had a smile!
When you enter it is an internet cafe area and bustling with the downtown crowd sampling all the various coffees and brews.
Our experience was wonderful!
Cozy cute coffee shop, good place to meet up with a friend

This is such a cool concept, and beautifully done. I got the New Orleans Hot Chicken sandwich with a side salad and everything was delicious! The staff was super friendly and the atmosphere was perfect. 10/10 recommend!

My guest and I attended the black history event multi course, talented chefs collaborated with each other to create southern inspired dishes. The meals were wonderful and I would love to have this experience at least twice a month.
Love this place and the great things they are doing in our community!
Delicious coffee & brunch + fantastic cause!
Excellent service and great people with an incredible story. Breakfast was served hot and fresh. You must eat here while in Charlotte!
Great experience.  I think I found my new favorite restaurant.  Wonderful customer service!

The concept, restaurant and the fact that the tables are indeed pretty well spread out are the good things about this place and hence, 2 starts. Tho I'm partial to small and local businesses,  I have almost never had this kind of experience.  My partner and I walk into this breakfast spot and we were pleasantly surprised at the space this has. I did read the reviews and wanted in on the food that was soo raved about. Anyways. We get there and barely 2 tables are occupied.  We get promptly seated, get our bevs and that's about all we got for the 30/45 mins we sat awaiting food. Meanwhile, the restaurant starts to get busy and everyone who was after us get their meals. Even the last ones we saw sitting behind us. We had to flag down our server who was very casual about ' I'll go check in cuz things happen in the kitchen you know' and shrugs off never to be seen again! This was the 3rd time I flagged him down cuz the second was coffee refill. We left and wanted to pay for the bevs but the manager who when I was explaining what happened made me feel rushed to leave while looking around said our coffee and tea was on him. In the 10 mins of us waiting. Then leaving I never heard from the server or the manager not even when I waited outside for my partner to get the car.  I'm sure you're short staff but then that makes me think how did everyone else get their meals after you got busy? I have never made to feel soo dismissed and rushed. I can't think of any other reason but the very casual attire I was in - sweats and a hoodie while I saw everyone else all dressed for the day. Some of have a day off, too and like to be casual. Rest assured, we'll not be ever visiting here after a humiliating experience.  I guess I wasn't preppy looking enuf cuz I never found an actual dress code. Rr was clean and did smell good. I'm sorry at the whole meals being missed in your kitchen but it sure was not a pleasant experience for us by any means either.
Great experience and wonderful food. Wonderful mission.
Fast service!  Isaiah is great. The best english muffin I've had in my life!
We went about two months ago . Totally enjoyed the food, and the place is very refreshing. Just loved the homemade jelly.  To bad they don't sell it in the restaurant.
Food was great!!!

I love this place!  The food is always great, the wait staff are friendly and attentive and their mission is definitely worth supporting. Only wish they were open on weekends.  If you love food and want to ale a difference in someone's life as well as in our city, then go and give them a try!
The back story makes the food taste even better. Awesome place to RESTORE HOPE, and it shows in the amazing staff.
My new go to coffie shop and cafe.
Fantastic food, vibe, and mission

Nice spot to chill, a spot for a nice date. I loved the scenery and the food was good. French toast was different but good, grits was different not my fave so I wouldn't recommend. Overall, great time with family with good food

We had a company holiday brunch there this morning. The menu was so great it was hard to choose what to get. Everything came out fast fresh and delicious. The service and food was phenomenal. I can't wait to bring back my family over the holidays to enjoy such a special place.
Great food in a safe atmosphere!  And a great cause!
Marvelous,  and so good , all money goes back into the community
Wife and I were walking distance from here on our vacation and enjoyed this Cafe every morning. Great service, great food and all for a great purpose.
Great fellowship and food

Excellent breakfast.  I tried the traditional cafe breakfast.   The service was great.  My friend has dietary restrictions.  They were very helpful in accommodating her needs.   The seating was fairly open so you did feel on top of other guests.

I finally got around to trying out Community Matters Cafe today.  Didn't know what to expect -- I mean it's owned, operated and staffed by Charlotte Rescue Mission.  I was blown away -- the atmosphere was amazing, the food was outstanding, the service was super attentive and the prices were really reasonable.  Located in an old mill building, it is rich with history and ambiance.  The menu is simple, but delicious -- absolutely do NOT miss the Brussel Sprouts -- the best I've ever had.  Next time, I'm trying the Fried Chicken which looked amazing.  The staff -- CLIENTS (that's what they call them) of the Rescue Mission.  These men and women are fighting to start their lives over and CRM is providing them with the skills.  What a privilege to meet them and encourage them in their journey.

They have a meeting room for groups of 20.  They are open for breakfast and lunch only.  They have outdoor seating.  You may want to call ahead for reservations to avoid a wait or to get a good seat.  I'll be back again and I'm bringing folks with me.

Not only will you get a top-level meal, but you are making a difference in the lives of important people who are on the upswing!  Don't miss it!
The food was awesome & so was the service.

Very attractive and spacious site that is hidden from the beaten path. The food is very good. It took slightly longer than I expected, but it was ok since I was actually having a meeting with colleagues. I will go back again.
Every dish is delicious. We go back every week. The pumpkin rolls at Thanksgiving were a big hit.
The atmosphere is welcoming the staff treat you like family and the food is great I come here at least three times a week.
Found this cute lil place after getting vaccinated uptown. Very chill, lots of parking and good eats. Indoor/outdoor Highly recommend!
Excellent food and service
Not the best food experience, small portions, larger price tags, and half my sandwich had no meat. For the price they need to do better with portion and preparation.
We were there for a PfO decades music show. It was awesome
5.0!!! Awesome restaurant with an equally great coffee shop/sitting area. Food quality, presentation & cost are excellent. Highly recommend.
The Johnny Cakes were amazing. Definitely my new favorite spot in Charlotte! Love the mission that this place stands for!
I love the atmosphere and the sugar crusted French toast.
Great food selections, and ambience. The customer service was amazing.
Great coffee and espresso. The service and food were excellent. I would recommend this place to anyone.
You need the Chicken sandwich and cheese grits...

Really well done renovation of a warehouse-style space, and I love the Christian influence and purpose for the cafe. They have a good variety on the menu, and I had their Cajun Sausage Skillet. The chunky potatoes were crispy and covered in peppers and onions. There was plenty of good andouille sausage, and it was all covered with a fried egg and drizzled with a spicy horseradish sauce. A thick piece of buttered wheat toast came on the side. The dish was delicious and filling, and the service was fast and very friendly. I highly recommend this place and am sure you would not be disappointed.
Nice have to eat a fine breakfast at the same place that gave a start on life ten years ago. I feel particularly blessed to be there.
Had lunch with friends in their outdoor patio. Good sandwiches and great service. The manager and the service personnel were the most gracious and polite and attentive people I've ever met!
Great coffee, well decorated, fantastic vibe.
I'm surrounded by positive vibes and Recovery people and lots of beautiful woman's come in eat here it's really blessed by God's touch of love I love everything about the place !

We had an absolutely lovely lunch here, everything was fresh- salads, sandwiches and complimentary muffins and grits. Our server was kind and attentive and the atmosphere was very pleasant. Thank you CMC!
Very friendly staff!   Food was delicious!   Upscale restaurant!   Please support!!
Great local spot, every time I've been I always happily came back for more. The energy, the food,  everything is amazing.

Community Matters Cafe serves EXCELLENT meals. The severs make you feel like you are the most important person in the restaurant and there are plenty of people there. I am so pleased and plan to make this my new go to eat spot. You will love it there---I already do.

Beyond extraordinary!!! The food is high quality, drinks are excellent, the atmosphere is casual, welcoming & relaxing! Staff is polite and above expectations attentive to every detail, couldn't ask for better-from the management staff Paula, Will to Cheyenne  Ronald, Montiece and the rest, every visit is such a blessing!! If I could give them more than 5s I would!! Keep doing God's work and your success is assured
Our breakfast was amazing! Beautiful interior, nice breakfast menu made of common meals with a twist, food beautifully served. All tips go to community.
Hidden treasure in 3rd Ward. Great food, awesome environment, and an amazing cause.  Super comfortable inside or on the patio.
Amazing food with a good mission

What a great spot for coffee and breakfast. They have a big menu and a case full of baked goods. The coffee and lattes have all been delicious. There is lots of seating indoors and a few tables outside. Everyone who works there has been so nice and helpful.
Delicious food--the best French toast we've ever had--excellent service, and great atmosphere. We recommend this cafe to everyone in Charlotte and everyone from out of state.

I was visiting Charlotte for my birthday and I had such a great brunch here.  Cinnabon latte was so good and the food was fresh.  Everyone was so nice and it was a very stylish farm to table environment.  I read up on the history that they have there and it sounds like a great program.  To everyone  DON'T FORGET IT'S ONE DAY AT A TIME AND REMEMBER TO FORGIVE AND LOVE YOURSELF
Really nice atmosphere, food was great and pet friendly too. Love the cause and we will back!!
food was good
Beautiful, delicious food customer service

If breakfast is served in heaven it will surely taste like this!! The food was beyond scrumptious. I have never been a fan of kale but went for the sweet potatoes kale breakfast skillet and was "wow!" beyond measure. Every single item ordered from our table was over-the-top delic, made with food that tasted like it had just been picked the morning of. The gentlemen who served us, on the patio, were hard-working and wonderful. If you don't like healthy, creative, out-of-the-box, yum-yum, for-a-great-cause mentality, this is too far above your breakfast repertoire. Otherwise, come and enjoy! I cannot think of a better cause to support than this one.
Fantastic food. Great to know you're investing in the community and providing opportunities when you eat there.

Besides amazing food and service, this is a fantastic non-profit supporting the community in a really meaningful way. Great spot for breakfast, lunch, meetings and to get away from the office for a while if you need to work.
chicken sandwich and grits were amazing
Delicious food, good service.
Great coffee and fresh bakery items.

Five stars for the mission behind the establishment. 4 stars for the meal. It was pretty good and presentation was great, staff was great, but food wasn't quite 5 stars. Pricing is very reasonable, not over priced at all. Nice covered patio, it was nice and breezy when we went. I normally don't like patios because of bugs but we caught it on a good day.
So good! Warm and inviting atmosphere. Great friendly service and incredibly fresh food. Will definitely be back!
Highly recommend for brunch or lunch! The purpose behind the cafe is awesome, the staff was super friendly, and the French toast was probably the best I've ever had! Will definitely return
Great food great mission

Great space for work, the mission behind this coffee shop is outstanding. This is what the community needs to support and get behind. All the employees were very welcoming and accommodating. Recommend.

My son and his new wife had their wedding reception at Community Matters Cafe and they did a wonderful job!  Plenty of room for the bride and groom dance plus guests.  Hors d'oeuvres and mocktails were wonderful.  I recommend this venue for any special event!
Wonderful people doing great things. Food was great and service was inspiring. Continued success to all!!
Great place.

Food is flavorful and good. Service is good and you support a helpful cause! The breakfast sandwich with turkey is excellent! The skillet can use more meat and the portion is small. Atmosphere is great for meeting up or brunch !

Wonderful experience at Community Matters! One of the best breakfasts in Charlotte combined with incredibly warm, friendly, attentive service. Food served piping hot, no time sitting under heat lamps. Homemade bread AND homemade jam! Fabulous coffee, and a pastry case to break your diet over. Terrific patio, both covered and open spaces. Don't miss this truly community-oriented breakfast and lunch spot!
Great place to go and get a pot of coffee they have amazing food and staff is super friendly.  They have outdoor and indoor seating to enjoy.

It was a wonderful place and the people who work there were very friendly. The service and food were good. When one eats there they are contributing to the health and welfare of others.  In my opinion that's a win-win.

This place was great. The place itself is nice and spacious. It flows nicely. The food was delicious! The only reason I give it 4 stars is because the service was very slow. It took forever for the waiter to take our order and it took forever for the food to come out. Definitely worth the wait though.

This is the best coffee shop in Charlotte hands down. Best latte, best customer service and the worship music was an awesome plus :) mike made my latte and it was the best latte I've had in my life and he was the nicest person! Already planning my next visit back!

Best French toast of my life. I also loved their vanilla chai, lovely and sweet. The grits and potatoes were good, too. Servers were attentive and the tables were nicely spaced out. Bring your check up to the counter to pay or you might be waiting a while (whoops)!
Good food and service, helping people to be productive assets in the community.
Great service, friendly and helpful staff

I'm going to go ahead and say this is the most underrated brunch spot in Charlotte. It was on the Yelp Charlotte Top 100 list and Best New Restaurants list in 2019, so clearly Yelpers know about it.

First off, I love that they're supporting Charlotte Rescue Mission. It's great to find restaurants with a great cause like this!

Covid-19: you can order and pay online. Pickup your food inside when you get there. They have a lot of outdoor seating, but it was crowded. We found a picnic table in the parking lot with no one else around.

We ordered the Pulled Pork Johnny Cake, Sugar Crusted French Toast, and the New Orleans Hot Chicken Sandwich with a side of Crispy Brussels Sprouts.

Everything was fantastic. I think the french toast was my favorite and the best I've had. I love how crispy and caramelized the outside was and how light and fluffy the inside was.

The Pulled Pork Johnny Cake was so unique. I loved the flavor of the corn based pancake and the pulled pork/egg was the perfect addition on top.

The chicken sandwich was perfectly crispy and delicous. I will say it wasn't at all hot so the name was a bit of a misnomer to me, but we loved it nonetheless.

We also got some pastries. We enjoyed the miso blondie, lemon cheesecake cookie sammie, and the molasses cookie sammie. The molasses cookie sammie was my favorite.

The inside is beautiful too. It would be a great place to hang out and get work done post Covid.

Don't make the mistake of sleeping on this place! Try them out for your next brunch.

Ordered a cold brew and was told it was just freshly made. However they didn't even have anymore cold brew and instead of asking what I would like instead they just gave me an iced coffee. Lacking communication and customer service. Don't tell someone you just made cold brew when you don't have any...
Wonderful environment, excellent service & fantastic cause.
Best coffee, incredible staff!
Absolutely amazing- will absolutely be back!
This place is amazing!!! The service is exceptional, the food is very fresh and delicious .I highly recommend for anytime they have all they brunch ....I absolutely love it !
Awesome food and great service... definitely a place to go to time and time again...
Excellent service, has outdoor seating with room to be distanced and heaters to stay warm. Also, you HAVE to get the hot chocolate it's amazing
Awesome food, awesome atmosphere, awesome mission

The quality, the mission, the prices, the service level... Can I give a 6th star? We usually come just for the coffee shop portion, but have occasionally hit the restaurant and the food is super fresh.get the honey bee latte!
The best chai tea latte in charlotte!  Great bread, rye, French toast and grits. Come back with friends.

The environment here is super friendly and welcoming.  They have a dine in menu and then a cafe setting, and one is able to choose when they walk in which experience they'd like.  Many coffee options, iced tea, and a lot of breakfast/lunch options.  Outdoor seating is large, and indoor has plenty of space as well.  Spent 3 hours here, and loved every minute.
Delicious food and a wonderful business to help support those in need!

My 1st visit to Community Matters Cafe and I'm so sad that I've been missing out! This place is amazing. From the delicious coffee, pastries and sandwiches to the free Wi-Fi, great service and meeting space, I was totally impressed. There are several tables outside with heat lamps and a great view of Bank of America Stadium. The best thing is that the Cafe benefits graduates of the Charlotte Rescue Mission program!!

What an amazingly delicious and easy way to give back to the community. I found my new meeting space.

Community Matters is a true gem! Their food, hospitality, ambiance, and mission are all above and beyond any expectation I could have for a cafe. My children and I are always greeting with warmth and acceptance, even if it's close to closing time. Throughout the pandemic I ordered curbside and the items always arrived as expected with the dine-in experience. I'm excited to be able to work/eat at the space again, and I'm so happy they made it through the economic downturn seen during the pandemic. If you haven't been -- please go! You won't be disappointed, and your dollars will go directly toward injecting some good into the Charlotte communities who need it most!
Coffee was so good. Service was excellent and the fact that they employ recovering addicts is awsome.
Wonderful the food ambience and their mission highly recommend
Muy agradable.
Nice menu I had the New Orleans got chicken sandwich and crispy brussel sprouts. Awesome lunch.
It was Great!!
The food is always excellent with generous portions.  They are very thoughtful with service and the space is beautiful.  The is plenty of room to eat on the patio.
Very spacious and great parking!!
Clean and nice with friendly employees.
Best Coffee Drinks EVER
Truly great coffee. So hard to find good coffee store nowadays. Also nice interior, great foods. Absolutely recommended
Great place to give back to the community
great atmosphere, mission and service! food is delicious
Atmosphere and purpose

This place is fantastic! Great coffee, food (the yogurt parfaits are to die for) and vibes. A snafu happened with my order and they were so quick to fix it and make it right. You can tell they really put their heart into everything from the food to the customer service.

This place is the best. Terrific atmosphere, fantastic coffee and food, sparkling water (which I love), and supports a wonderful cause in partnering with the Charlotte Rescue Mission. The employees who work there are going through the program and graduate after several months. Little pricier for the food but well worth it. If you go, try the Johnny cakes with pork bbq on top. Amazing.
Love this place! Great coffee and pastries and the restaurant side has amazing breakfast!

Great atmosphere and great food. Was able to eat a vegan meal, which is always a nice surprise when eating somewhere new. The coffee was just OK but don't feel it was a rostery anyway. Def like they have oatmilk for the coffee!

I love it here. You can just tell this space is loved and cared about. I can always find an outlet, which is nice for writing, and there is plenty of natural light. Even when it's packed, it's never loud or crowded. The fact that this place exists, to me, is a symbol of our values as a community in Charlotte. I am more than happy to swipe my card at the register.
Fantastic lunch and supports a great cause.  Get there early- it gets busy!
Friendly people
Great coffee shop, always pleasant staff
This is a great local coffee shop and a great cause to support, the inside was a great place for me to have an early morning business meeting.
Wonderful food as always
Cool place to be
I love this place and what they stand for as a true community business. Great food and great people too!
Wonderful Place, Food and Concept. Highly recommend Breakfast Lunch or a quick grab and go Pastry and Coffee .
DELICIOUS!!!!  Also, feels good to give back to community via eating here...
My first time going and it was great! Service was really good and food was fantastic!

All around wonderful place. They assist in the community. All employees are graduates of a community outreach program.
The food was delicious! I had a turkey burger, which had cranberries and cheese inside it. The cheesy grits I chose as a side were quite good.
Great food. Great cause.
This place is amazing.i will be back... With friends!

I absolutely love this cafe!! The food is amazing, and all of their cafe products are great too! Cindie and Ernest, who work here, are some of the best people! I always look forward to coming here for meetings and a nice place to work! Highly recommend :)

Wonderful people and ambiance. This local eatery and coffee shop has a mission and a purpose! Providing hands on job skill training for their employees while serving tasty food. There is space in the coffee shop area for meetings or studying and a full service restaurant below. This is a place you must visit!
Great coffee and such a comforting atmosphere
Excellent food and service,will definitely be back.
doing the Lord's work every day. awesome coffee and food
Great spot for breakfast and lunch. Wonderful location in an underserved neighborhood. Close to the stadium for gameday. Desserts looked amazing!!! Can't wait to go back
Good food!  Good meeting place!
Love this place
Friendly, and great coffee
I reserved the private meeting room for an office retreat and had a wonderful experience! The food was wonderful and the staff was attentive. Thank you Alyssa for all your help!
Fantastic
What a great place. Super nice people, facility is excellent. Worthy cause. Just great.
Nice atmosphere! Love how they are giving back to the community! My French toast and cheesy grits to go were very good.
I love the mission; the staff and, the atmosphere. Very thoughtful. Absolutely a wonderful experience. The food, a bonus! Home-cooking elevated.

Such a GORGEOUS, modern spot to relax & help support  men who've successfully completed rehab programs next door (& women at Doves Nest on West Blvd.) Jewelry for sale at the door that I am sure is by local artists. Definitely worth checking out. Awesome patio area. Dog friendly.
Food great. Service good too. Try it.
Really loved the food and service. Also picked up some cute jewelry.
Great atmosphere and wonderful service
Always a pleasure to visit this hidden gem. Food made with love, by those given a second chance.

Awesome place, didn't know they had a good menu so I will definitely be back to try some of their cooking. Coffee though was great. Everyone was very friendly. Great atmosphere to work or meet for coffee/food.
Es un lugar dode puedes hir y disfrutar de un delicioso cafe y relajarte y disfruar un momento de tranquilidad.... Aparte brindan ayuda a la comunidad
The food was great! The service was very good and I will be back.
If only I lived closer I could visit this great spot more. Such an awesome layout and the mission of the cafe brings me in! Highly recommended.
Quaint place.  A little pricey, but wonderful customer service
Clean, bright and welcoming. The food and staff were very good.
Excellent. Love everything about this place.
Good atmosphere and plenty of seating
Best coffee shop in Charlotte!
My favorite Charlotte breakfast spot, served with some amazing smiles.  I'm looking forward to my next visit.

What a neat place, with a great vibe that supports the local community. Enjoyed a simple breakfast and friendly  service.  Will definitely be back!  Oh, and tip big... the money goes to support local folks in need.
